Package de.wwu.muggl.vm.initialization

Provides initialization classes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ReferenceValue This interface is implemented by all reference values.
 

Class Summary
Arrayref This class represents a reference to an array.
FieldContainer This abstract class is a container for fields; it offers a Hashtable that stores instances of Field as well as their corresponding values.
InitializedClass This class represents a statically initialized ClassFile.
ModifieableArrayref This ModifieableArrayref inherits the complete functionality of an arrayref and does only modify the put(int index, Object element)-Method.
ObjectComparator This class offers static methods to compare objects of the virtual machine provided by this application.
Objectref This class represents a concrete instance of a ClassFile.
StaticInitializationSupport Provides static methods that are needed for initialization procedures.
ThrowableGenerator This classes provides method to generate instances of type Throwable thrown during the execution of instructions.
 

Exception Summary
InitializationException Exception that is to be thrown on problems while initializing objects used by the virtual machine.
PrimitiveWrappingImpossibleException Exception that is to be thrown when a class file cannot be instantiated as a wrapper for a primitive type.
 

Error Summary
FieldAccessError Exception that is to be thrown when trying to fetch or modify the value of a Field that does not belong to the class accessed.
 

Package de.wwu.muggl.vm.initialization Description

Provides initialization classes. This contains references for object and array references as well as initialized classes. It also provides the means of manipulating fields.

Author:
Tim Majchrzak
